instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3023: What is 820-3023? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3023</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> mouse is on and off
threads.message:
Recived this macbook. Board: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3023</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>
When I press power no video, but I can see how mouse light up for 2 seg and off and on and off again and so on. I check the board and found cracked ram. Could be that the problem?

Ram is written: J2108BCSE-DJ-F
1148R937F90

Also I cannot find where to buy this ram. All board from aliexpress comes without ram chips. Any idea?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3023</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> mouse is on and off
threads.message:
Cracked RAM will not let the board boot. You have to wonder how it got cracked though, was this dropped?
J2108BCSE-DJ-F is on Aliexpress.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3023</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> mouse is on and off
threads.message: Dropped yes. Worth to replace ckracked chip? Only one chip is cracked.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3023</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> mouse is on and off
threads.message: Nope, probably more damage than just the RAM. This board is trash.
